name: World of Warplanes
description: World of Warplanes is an aerial combat MMO action game set in the Golden Age of military aviation. Throwing players into a never-ending battle for dominance of the skies, the game allows aircraft enthusiasts to pursue full-scale careers as virtual pilots, earning their wings in intense 12-vs-12 battles where supremacy in the air depends...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-2xxx or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Shaders 3.0 (NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT 512MB, Radeon HD 3870) / higher) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 35 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution: 1280х768
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 x64 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-2ххх, AMD FX 8xxx / higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 660 1GB, Radeon HD 7870 / higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 45 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution: 1280х768
